title: Les Yeux Fermés
overview: In the fall of 1994, Simon, 15 years old, goes to the convenience store and never returns. The next day, his body was fished out of the river. 27 years later, his younger sister Élise tries to understand why he threw himself off the bridge. With the help of Philippe, a charismatic pastoral animator who used to lead Simon's support group, she discovers that everything is always more complex than it seems.
